EPSErrorType

The error type used to assess accuracy of computed solutions

Synopsis

typedef enum { EPS_ERROR_ABSOLUTE,
               EPS_ERROR_RELATIVE,
               EPS_ERROR_BACKWARD } EPSErrorType;
